result.execSummary:
Bruce Bernard Grady was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Bruce Bernard Grady was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Bruce Bernard Grady

records.addlTxt:
Attorney Helmi Hamad in court.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney appeared by video means for .  Defendant has been turned over to the State of MISSOURI on April 20, 2022.
On motion of the state, Court ordered case closed.

Defendant Bruce Bernard Grady in court with attorney Amanda Poznanski.  Defendant Bruce Bernard Grady in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Bruce Bernard Grady appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Childs, Branch 2.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of rights and right to file a Writ of Habeas Corpus.  Court found the defendant is the person wanted in the State of MISSOURI.  Defendant waived extradition.  Signed Waiver of Extradition received and filed.  Court ordered the defendant REMANDED into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department.    DEFENDANT DOES NOT QUALIFY FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION IF RELEASED FROM CUSTODY.  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/0a25f782-7319-dd31-4ed9-c0f452a2bc2b  Status conference scheduled for April 27, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Criminal Warrant for Commitment.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
